sen.j: 河鰭 公陳（かわばた きんつら、安永2年9月4日 (旧暦)（1773年10月19日） - 文政2年8月22日 (旧暦)（1819年10月10日））は、江戸時代後期の公卿。
sen.e: Kintsura KAWABATA (October 19, 1773 – October 10, 1819) was a court noble of the late Edo period.

sen.j: 父は権大納言中山愛親。
sen.e: His father was Gon Dainagon (provisional chief councilor of state) Naruchika NAKAYAMA.

sen.j: 権大納言河鰭実祐（1758年－1832年）の養子となる。
sen.e: He was adapted by Gon Dainagon Sanesuke KAWABATA (1758 – 1832).

sen.j: 実子はなく、養子に河鰭実清（権大納言飛鳥井雅威の子だが、17歳で夭折）・河鰭実利（右近少将持明院基敦の子。1800年－1850年）がいた。
sen.e: He didn't have biological child, so adapted Sanekiyo KAWABATA who was a son of Gon Dainagon Masatake ASUKAI, however, Sanekiyo died young, so he adapted Sanetoshi KAWABATA (1800 - 1850) who was a son of Ukon no shosho (minor captain of the right division of inner palace guards) Motoatsu JIMYOIN.
sen.cmt: 河鰭実清Sanekiyo KAWABATA飛鳥井雅威Masatake ASUKAI河鰭実利Sanetoshi KAWABATA持明院基敦Motoatsu JIMYOIN
sen.e: He didn't have biological child, so adopted Sanekiyo KAWABATA who was a son of Gon Dainagon Masatake ASUKAI, however, Sanekiyo died young at the age of 17, so he adopted Sanetoshi KAWABATA (1800 - 1850) who was a son of Ukon no shosho (minor captain of the right division of inner palace guards) Motoatsu JIMYOIN.
sen.cmt: 養子＝adopted 訳では「実清が夭折したので実利を養子にした」の意味になっていますが、原文からずれているように思います。確認をお願いします。
sen.e: He didn't have a biological child, but had adopted children including Sanekiyo KAWABATA (a son of Masatake ASUKAI, Gon Dainagon, but died at the age of 17) and Sanetoshi KAWABATA (1800-1850, a son of Motoatsu JIMYOIN, Ukon no shosho [minor captain of the right division of inner palace guards]).

sen.e: On December 8, 1805 (in old lunar calendar), he was raised to Jusanmi (junior third rank).
